Title: Default
Author: dev9998 and cresmondo
Description: Default contains a variety of iconic shirts, such as hoodies, turtlenecks, croptops, and more.

Title: Custom
Author: dev9998, cresmondo, and ojsauce
Description: Custom contains plenty of diverse and random shirts assorted into one singular pack.

Title: Expressions
Author: cresmondo
Description: a pack i made for content creators to use for their videos!! features a wide array of expressions, credit isnt required but would be nice!!

Title: Gorilla Games
Author: supercatcraze, stridefr, and kpmaxo
Description: dev9998 and SuperCatCraze have partnered together to release the Gorilla Games pack based on Virtual Stump map. Let the new game begin.

Title: Pride Hoodies
Author: cresmondo
Description: a pack that comes with 14 pride-flag themed hoodies!
